CustomField.formula:
CASE( Revenue_Group__c ,
"Classified - Employment","Employment", "Classified - Marketplace","Marketplace", "Classified - Motor Vehicles","Motor Vehicles", "Classified - Amusements","Other", "Classified - Other","Other", "Classified - Personals Adult","Other", "Classified - Personals Other","Other", "Classified - Tenders and Public Notices","Other", "Classified - Travel","Other", "Classified - Real Estate","Real Estate", "Classified - TrueLocal Professional","Services & Trade", "Classified - TrueLocal Trades","Services & Trade", "Amusements","Amusements", "Employment","Employment", "House","House", "Motor Vehicle Dealers","National", "National (Communications/business equipment)","National", "National (Computers)","National", "National (Finance)","National", "National (Food and beverages)","National", "National (Gambling/gaming)","National", "National (Government/political)","National", "National (Media)","National", "National (Motor Vehicle Manufacturers)","National", "National (Other)","National", "National (Personal care products)","National", "National (Pharmaceutical / Health Products)","National", "National (Travel)","National", "Public Notices","Public Notices", "Real Estate","Real Estate", "Retail","Retail", "","", "Error - Notify system admin - Revenue Group L1 field" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do not display field on page layout. To be used for reporting only. Note: The same field exist within bookings to capture the actuals.
CustomField.label: Revenue Group L1
